title: Dow Jones Bear Market: 3 No-Brainer Stocks for Market Growth
text: These Dow stocks should prosper when the current bear market ends.

title: 7 Battery Stocks to Buy and Hold for Big-Time Gains
text: As we enter into the era of renewable energy sources like solar and wind power, battery companies are one of the fastest-growing sectors. Based on research from Precedence Research, the global electric vehicle (EV) battery market size is set to be worth $559.87 billion in 2030 and growing fast at a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 32% from 2022 to 2030.

title: Honeywell forecasts increase in private jet deliveries over next decade
text: Honeywell International Inc on Sunday lifted its outlook for business jet deliveries, as the COVID-19 pandemic brought in a wave of first-time users and buyers in the private flying market.

title: Hyundai's air taxi unit picks Honeywell as avionics supplier
text: Hyundai Motor Co's air taxi unit has picked aerospace supplier Honeywell International Inc to develop avionics systems for its eVTOL (electric vertical take-off and landing) aircraft, the companies said, ahead of an announcement next week.

title: Honeywell (HON) Offers Mobile Devices to Tractor Supply
text: Honeywell (HON) helps Tractor Supply streamline its operations and increase productivity by providing the latter with its CT40XP mobile computer and cloud-based software.
